Package pizzan

Interface OrderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderServiceImpl
    public interface OrderService
    Order web service This service is used to add orders and pizzas As an admin you can add new pizza and delete them, get all customer orders As a customer you can order a pizza, get your order list Access point : http://localhost:8080/OrderService

    • Method Detail

      • addPizza

        boolean addPizza​(java.lang.String token,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 double price)
        Allows an admin to add a pizza to the list of available pizzas
        Parameters:
        token - admin authentification token
        name - name of the new pizza
        price - price of the new pizza
        Returns:
        true if the new pizza has been added

      • deletePizza

        boolean deletePizza​(java.lang.String token,
                    int id)
        Allows an admin to delete a pizza from the list of available pizzas
        Parameters:
        token - admin authentification token
        id - id of the pizza to delete
        Returns:
        true if the pizza has been deleted

      • getPizzas

        java.util.List<Pizza> getPizzas​(java.lang.String token)
        Get the list of available pizzas
        Parameters:
        token - user authentification token
        Returns:
        the list of pizzas

      • getPizza

        Pizza getPizza​(java.lang.String token,
               int id)
        Get a pizza information
        Parameters:
        id - the pizza's id
        Returns:
        a pizza

      • addOrder

        boolean addOrder​(java.lang.String token,
                 int pizzaId)
        Allows a customer to order a pizza
        Parameters:
        token - customer authentification token
        pizzaId - the pizza's to order id
        Returns:
        true if the pizza has been ordered

      • getUnpaidOrders

        java.util.List<Order> getUnpaidOrders​(java.lang.String token)
        Allows a customer to get current orders (i.e. orders which are not paid yet)
        Parameters:
        token - user authentification token
        Returns:
        current orders
